sentence.Network_en: You'll need time to familiarize yourself with our procedures.
sentence.Network_cn: 你需要时间熟悉我们的程序。

sentence.Network_en: The goal of the experiment was to familiarize the people with the new laws.
sentence.Network_cn: 试行的目的就是要让人们熟悉新法规。

sentence.Network_en: He tried to familiarize himself with the use of the new fool.
sentence.Network_cn: 他努力熟悉新工具的使用.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (in the sense 'make well known'): from French familiariser, from familiaire (see familiar)

entry.def: If you familiarize yourself with something, or if someone familiarizes you with it, you learn about it and start to understand it.

example.ex: I was expected to familiarise myself with the keyboard...
example.tran: 对我的要求是熟悉键盘。

example.ex: The goal of the experiment was to familiarize the people with the new laws.
example.tran: 试行的目的就是要让人们熟悉新法规。

sentences.sentence: "you should acquaint yourself with your new computer"
"We familiarized ourselves with the new surroundings"

sentences.en: I familiarized myself with everyone’s name before the meeting.
sentences.cn: 我在开会之前熟悉了一下每个人的名字。

sentences.en: She familiarized herself with the case history of her new patient.
sentences.cn: 她熟悉了一下新病人的病历。
